metIdentify

Source: R/metIdentify.R
metIdentify1.Rd

Identify peaks based on MS/MS database.

metIdentify1(ms1.data, ms2.data, ms1.ms2.match.mz.tol = 25,
  ms1.ms2.match.rt.tol = 10, ms1.match.ppm = 25, ms2.match.ppm = 30,
  mz.ppm.thr = 400, ms2.match.tol = 0.5, fraction.weight = 0.3,
  dp.forward.weight = 0.6, dp.reverse.weight = 0.1,
  rt.match.tol = 30, polarity = c("positive", "negative"), ce = "30",
  column = c("hilic", "rp"), ms1.match.weight = 0.25,
  rt.match.weight = 0.25, ms2.match.weight = 0.5, path = ".",
  total.score.tol = 0.5, candidate.num = 3, database, threads = 3)

Arguments

ms1.data

The name of ms1 peak table (csv format). Column 1 is "name", Column 2 is "mz" and column is "rt" (second).
ms2.data

MS2 data, they must be mgf of msp files. For example, ms2.data = c("test.mgf", "test2.msp").
ms1.ms2.match.mz.tol

MS1 peak and MS2 spectrum matching m/z tolerance.
ms1.ms2.match.rt.tol

MS1 peak and MS2 spectrum matching RT tolerance.
ms1.match.ppm

Precursor match ppm tolerance.
ms2.match.ppm

Fragment ion match ppm tolerance.
mz.ppm.thr

m/z
ms2.match.tol

MS2 match tolerance.
fraction.weight

Fraction weight.
dp.forward.weight

Forward DP weight.
dp.reverse.weight

Reverse DP weight.
rt.match.tol

RT match tolerance.
polarity

The polarity of data, "positive"or "negative".
ce

Collision energy.
column

"hilic" or "rp".
ms1.match.weight

MS1 match weight.
rt.match.weight

RT match weight.
ms2.match.weight

MS2 match weight.
path

Work directory.
total.score.tol

Total score tolerance.
candidate.num

The number of candidate.
database

MS2 database name.
threads

Number of threads

Value

A metIdentifyClass object.

Contents

  • Value
